rathnapura padawiya bhara klitas chandrasiri perera rajaguru prasadin wahanse amathamin agamathiwaraya helidaraw kale thama ekolos wathawath wathikanuwata gos athi athara awastha nawayakadi ee ee wakawanuwala pap wahansela da baha dutu bawaya.agamathiwaraya me charikawedi wawaladeniya wiharasthanaye pawathi kagalu disthrik sangha sammelanayata da sahabhagi wiya.ehidi agamathi di. mu. jayarathna siya kathawata mula piruwe sanskrutha shlokayak us handin gayana karamini.rajya palakayin gindara sthrin saha pawiddanta wadipura samipa nowiya yuthu yayi ema sanskrutha shlokaye sihala arutha da agamathiwaraya sandahan kale ehi asungena siti mathi amathiwaru desa balamini.edina diwa aaharayata mahipala herath maha amathiwarayage molamure mawathe niwesata pamini agamathiwaraya siya deshapalana diwiye boho rasamuthu than maha amathiwaraya athulu sesu pirisata pawasamin warin wara oralosuwa baluwe edina sawasa 3.00 ta wenath raswimakata sahabhagi wimata athi bawa kiyamini.kagalla disthrikkaye sarwa aagamika samuluwa amathana atharathura agamathi thuma kagalla disthrik sanwardhana kamituwata da goda wiya.ee ehi sama sabhapathi mahipala herath maha amathiwaraya da katiwaya.mahacharya thissa witharana, athawuda senewirathna yana kabinat amathiwaru da lakshman yapa abewardhana, ranjith siyambaalapitiya, ke. di. es. gunawardhana, lalith disanayaka, jagath balasuriya yana niyojya amathyawaru da ee wana witath ehi asun gena sitiyaha.“mamayi gunawardhana amathithumayi lakshman yapa abewardhana amathiwarayayi arunu wita anek hamoma kagalle udawiyane yanuwen pawasamin sabhawa sisara balu agamathiwaraya waga kala haki hama bim angalakma waga kala disthrikkaya hatiyata kagalla disthrikkaya handinwiya.eeth ape disthrikkaya bohoma punchiyi.
